remarks:
Conjunction inside and outside of a substitution are equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.) 

---

 Conjunction inside and outside of a substitution are equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 3-Feb-2018.)
statement: sban $p |- ( [ y / x ] ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( [ y / x ] ph /\ [ y / x ] ps ) ) $.
